PromptWriting.title: Prompt Writing Tips
PromptWriting.description: The quality of your prompt greatly affects the images you get. Here are some tips:

0.title: Be Specific and Detailed
0.description: Include specific details about the subject, scene, lighting, mood, and style
examples: A tranquil lake at dusk, mountains in the background, golden light, reflections in the water
A cyberpunk cityscape at night, neon lights, flying cars, and holographic ads

1.title: Specify Art Styles
1.description: Mention specific art styles or artists for more consistent results
examples: A Renaissance-style portrait, rich in detail, realistic lighting
An impressionist landscape, vibrant colors, visible brushstrokes

2.title: Use Negative Prompts
2.description: Specify what you don't want to see in the image
examples: Negative prompt: blurry, distorted, low quality, incorrect anatomy
Negative prompt: text, watermark, signature, oversaturated colors

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Picasso AI

0.question: What is Picasso AI?
0.answer: Picasso AI is a powerful AI image generation platform that allows users to create stunning images from text descriptions. We use state-of-the-art AI models to turn your ideas into visual art.

1.question: How do I use Picasso AI?
1.answer: Using Picasso AI is simple. Just enter a detailed description of the image you want to create, choose your preferred style and settings, and click the generate button. Our AI will create the image based on your description.

2.question: Can I use generated images for commercial purposes?
2.answer: Yes, images generated with a paid plan can be used for commercial purposes. Images generated with the free plan are for personal use only. Please see our terms of use for more details.

3.question: How can I get better results?
3.answer: For best results, we recommend using detailed and specific descriptions, including scene, style, lighting, and mood. You can also try different style presets and settings for varied effects.

4.question: What image formats are supported?
4.answer: We support multiple image formats, including JPG, PNG, and WebP. Generated images can be downloaded in any of these formats.

5.question: How does Picasso AI protect my privacy?
5.answer: We take privacy very seriously. We do not store your prompts or generated images on our servers. Your creations are completely private and deleted after generation.

6.question: What are state-of-the-art models?
6.answer: Picasso AI uses state-of-the-art AI models known for their image quality, prompt accuracy, and versatility. These models are usually expensive, but Picasso AI makes them free for everyone.

7.question: Are there any restrictions on using Picasso AI?
7.answer: While Picasso AI is free and unlimited, we maintain standard content moderation to ensure proper use. The platform is currently web-only, with mobile apps planned for the future.

8.question: Can I use generated images for commercial purposes?
8.answer: Yes, you own the copyright to images generated with Picasso AI. You can use them for personal and commercial purposes, making it ideal for creators and businesses.

9.question: Is Picasso AI available on mobile devices?
9.answer: Currently, Picasso AI is accessible via its website, which works well on mobile. Dedicated mobile apps are in development for an even better experience.

10.question: What languages does Picasso AI support?
10.answer: Picasso AI supports multilingual interface and prompt input, making it convenient for users worldwide.

11.question: How to get support if I encounter problems?
11.answer: If you have any questions or technical issues, please contact our support team at support@picasso.app.

Testimonials.title: User Testimonials
Testimonials.subtitle: Hear what our users have to say

0.content: Picasso AI has completely transformed my design workflow. It quickly turns my ideas into visual concepts, greatly improving my efficiency.

1.content: As a developer, I often need to create various image assets for projects. Picasso AI lets me generate the images I need quickly, and the quality is amazing.

2.content: In marketing, we need a lot of high-quality visual content. Picasso AI helps us quickly create attractive images, boosting our marketing results.

3.content: Picasso AI makes my product prototypes more expressive and saves me a lot of design time. Highly recommended for all product people!

4.content: The AI-generated images have brought endless inspiration to my creations. Picasso AI is one of my favorite tools.

Footer.description: Create stunning AI images in seconds.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to Picasso. By accessing or using our AI image generation service at picasso.app ("the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). Please read these Terms carefully before using the Service.

sections.title: 2. Service Description
sections.content: Picasso is a free AI image generation service powered by the FLUX+Der model. We provide users with the ability to generate images from text descriptions without requiring registration or payment.

sections.title: 3. User Obligations
sections.content: By using our Service, you agree to:
items: Use the Service in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations
Not attempt to circumvent any limitations or security measures
Not use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purposes
Not interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers
Not generate content that violates intellectual property rights or contains harmful material

sections.title: 4. Intellectual Property Rights
sections.content: Images generated through our Service are provided under the Creative Commons Zero (CC0) license. You may use the generated images for any purpose, including commercial use, without attribution requirements. However, you acknowledge that certain prompts or outputs may be subject to third-party rights.

sections.title: 5. Privacy and Data Protection
sections.content: Our privacy practices are outlined in our Privacy Policy. We do not store user prompts or generated images, and we do not require user registration or collect personal information.

sections.title: 6. Service Availability
sections.content: While we strive to maintain continuous service availability, we do not guarantee uninterrupted access to the Service. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the Service at any time without notice.

sections.title: 7. Content Guidelines
sections.content: You agree not to generate:
items: Content that violates any applicable laws or regulations
Hateful, discriminatory, or offensive content
Content that infringes on intellectual property rights
Sexually explicit or pornographic content
Content intended to harass, abuse, or harm others

sections.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: The Service is provided 'as is' without any warranties. We shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of the Service, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, and consequential damages.
items: Content that violates any applicable laws or regulations
Hateful, discriminatory, or offensive content
Content that infringes on intellectual property rights
Sexually explicit or pornographic content
Content intended to harass, abuse, or harm others

sections.title: 9. Changes to Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the Service after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms. We will notify users of material changes by posting the updated Terms on this page.

sections.title: 10. Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@picasso.best.

sections.title: 10. Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@picasso.best.

TermsPage.contact: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@picasso.best.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: At Picasso, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our AI image generation service at picasso.app ("the Service").

sections.title: 2. Information We Don't Collect
sections.content: We are committed to minimal data collection. We do not:
items: Require user registration or accounts
Store your prompts or generated images
Collect personal information
Use cookies for tracking
Share any data with third parties

sections.title: 3. Information We Process
sections.content: The only information we process includes:
items: Temporary text prompts during image generation
Generated images during the creation process
Basic usage analytics (non-personally identifiable)

sections.title: 4. How We Use Information
sections.content: Any information processed is used solely for:
items: Generating images in response to your prompts
Improving the Service's performance and quality
Maintaining service security and preventing abuse

sections.title: 5. Data Retention
sections.content: We follow a strict no-storage policy. All prompts and generated images are processed in real-time and deleted immediately after generation. We do not maintain any database of user content.

sections.title: 6. Security Measures
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction of the limited data we process. Our service operates on secure, encrypted connections.

sections.title: 7. Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our Service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect or process information from children under 13.

sections.title: 8. Changes to Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

sections.title: 9. Your Rights
sections.content: Since we don't collect personal data, there is typically no user data to:
items: Access
Correct
Delete
Export

sections.title: 10. Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@picasso.best.

sections.title: 11. Legal Basis
sections.content: We process the minimal required information based on legitimate interests in providing and improving the Service while maintaining user privacy and security.

PrivacyPage.contact: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@picasso.best.
